title: When I say no I feel guilty
brief_description: Deals with assertiveness and verbal traps such as being manipulated, side tracked, sensitive to criticism, and being unable to say ‘no’. Verbal skills discussed include: broken record, fogging, negative assertion, negative inquiry, free information self-disclosure.
